import React, { Fragment} from 'react'; import { Button, Dropdown, UncontrolledButtonDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, Container } from 'reactstrap'; import CSSTransitionGroup from 'react-transition-group/CSSTransitionGroup'; // import {Animated} from "react-animated-css"; import { Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, } from 'reactstrap'; export default class DropdownStyles extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); this.onMouseEnter = this.onMouseEnter.bind(this); this.onMouseLeave = this.onMouseLeave.bind(this); this.state = { dropdownOpen: false }; } toggle() { this.setState(prevState => ({ dropdownOpen: !prevState.dropdownOpen })); } onMouseEnter() { this.setState({dropdownOpen: true}); } onMouseLeave() { this.setState({dropdownOpen: false}); } render() { return ( Dropdown Menu Styles Basic Header Menus Settings Actions Dividers Hover Open Header Action Another Action Another Action Rounded Header Menus Settings Actions Dividers Shadow Header Menus Settings Actions Dividers Hover Link Header Menus Settings Actions Dividers Hover Background Header Menus Settings Actions Dividers Icons Header Menus Settings Actions Dividers Right aligned Header Menus Settings Actions Dividers Basic Primary Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Secondary Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Success Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Info Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Warning Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Danger Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Focus Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Alt Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Light Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Dark Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Link Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Split Dropdowns Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Split Outline Dropdowns Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menus Settings Header Actions Dividers Menu positions
